title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 456.3 - Instructor certification
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 456.3 - Instructor certification

State Regulations

Certification of an instructor's qualifications shall be
on the following basis: (a) attendance
at a training seminar conducted by a representative of the bureau; or
(b) possession of a valid New York State
teacher's license and the written recommendation of a regional coordinator; or
(c) assisting a certified
instructor in the presentation of the New York State young snowmobile
operator's safety training course. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
456.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
